author: thomreis
body:
Cleaning up of L1T muon offline DQM configuration

- Renaming of config files to be in line with Egamma naming scheme
- Changing the directory for the DQM output histograms
- Using the common efficiency harvesting module also used by L1TEgamma and dropping the special muon one
- Adding axis titles to efficiency plots
- Renaming the L1T muon offline module since it will not only produce histograms for efficiencies in the future but also resolution histograms and others.
title: L1T muon offline DQM config cleaning - 92x
